entry.title: Russian Airstrike Hits Maternity Hospital in Ukraine
entry.content: A Russian airstrike hit a maternity hospital in the besieged city of Mariupol and buried people including children under rubble, Ukrainian authorities said, as President Vladimir Putin’s forces pressed their offensives across Ukraine.

entry.title: Waves of Ukrainian Refugees Overwhelm Poland
entry.content: As two refugees cross the border every three seconds, cities can’t buy beds fast enough and Poland’s population is rising for the first time in decades.

entry.title: Russia, Out to Contain NATO, Instead Reignites the Alliance
entry.content: The invasion of Ukraine has given the North Atlantic Treaty Organization renewed focus after three decades of seeking a purpose in the post-Cold War world.
